column4: i've installed ubuntu first time on a laptop, a lenovo 3000 N100 anything i should do ? power/cpu managment, etc ?
i've installed ubuntu first time on a laptop, a lenovo 3000 N100 anything i should do ? power/cpu managment, etc ?
I'd recommend look up the linux on laptops files for that laptop and closely related models.
check the http://www.linux-laptop.net/ site, that and google are your best firends
